name: Walter Phebus
descriptions: Walter Phebus is a rancher from New California residing on the New Vegas Strip in Fallout: New Vegas.
A bighorner rancher and a seasoned brahmin baron,
Walter, deciding that Gunderson needs to be taken down by force, left his ranch to travel to New Vegas with Ethel in tow, seeking revenge against Heck however he can.

By the time they reached New Vegas and passed through the gate onto the Strip, Walter learned that Heck had come to reside in the Ultra-Luxe casino but did not know the reason why. He and Ethel took to sitting near the monorail station connecting New Vegas to Camp McCarran, hoping for any news on Heck's movements to act on.
detailed_location: New Vegas Strip, outside theLas Vegas Boulevard Station

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Howdy, son! How can I help you? But make it quick. Goddamn heat's worse in this town than in the middle of a Brahmin herd at noon.

topics.topic_text: You look more than just too hot - what's the matter?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Sharp eyes on you, all right. We've gone through a heap of trouble to get in town. Ethel says I just need to wet my throat.

topics.topic_text: Then have, I don't know, some water or something.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] A drink? Nonsense. All I need right now is to settle a score. We didn't come a long ways just to stroll our best clothes around.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to ask you some other questions.
topics.response_text: I got some time - what's eating you?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! Be good.

topics.topic_text: I have questions about you.
topics.response_text: Okay. What'd you want know?

topics.topic_text: I'd like to ask you about the Wasteland.
topics.response_text: I know it better than my wife's corset! What about it, kid?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about Heck Gunderson.
topics.response_text: I hear you. What's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: What was that about settling a score?
topics.response_text: There's a long list of grievances that Heck Gunderson's got to answer for, kid. I'm here to make sure that "rancher" stops stealing our lands.

topics.topic_text: I have news about the Gundersons
topics.response_text: You have? What are you waiting for, kid? Spill the beans!

topics.topic_text: How do Wastelanders cope with current times?
topics.response_text: {Bragging Jokingly}Steeling our pure-breed resolve, that's how! We've faced the Wasteland right in the old mug and told her to shove it!

topics.topic_text: Maybe Heck would listen to your pleas if his son's life was at stake.
topics.response_text: A ransom? I doubt that snake's got enough soul to care that much for his own youngin. Besides, what's to stop him after his son's returned?

topics.topic_text: Heck's life and a safe future have a steep price, Walter. 1000 caps' my fee.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I'll pay that much and die a happy man when my time comes. So, we got a deal?

topics.topic_text: Heck's life? That's big game, a 1000 caps.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Cut that in half and we got a clean deal, kid.

topics.topic_text: I want to talk to you about our deal.
topics.response_text: I hear you. What's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: You're not from around here, are you?
topics.response_text: Darn far it is, our ranch. Ethel would be happy to yap about that - I got more important things in mind, kid.

topics.topic_text: Are you a Bighorn rancher?
topics.response_text: Bighorners' my trade since I was a youngin. I confess it's hard living these days, kid. The Wasteland ain't the same anymore.

topics.topic_text: What else can you tell me about Heck Gunderson?
topics.response_text: What more you want? He's a slithering snake, what he is. One of the biggest landowners this side of the Colorado and it's all stolen, I tell you.

topics.topic_text: Heck claims to be an honest rancher.
topics.response_text: Sure, kid, and I still hump like a buck in Spring. That Gunderson's a liar and born of a viper, I swear.

topics.topic_text: What do you plan to do about him?
topics.response_text: I have no illusions that he'll ever stop his plundering. So I'm just going to make him suffer, that's what I'm going to do.

topics.topic_text: Heck's looking for his disappeared son. I've agreed to find him.
topics.response_text: I'll be damned! You mean the young Gunderson? That's a shave tail if I ever saw one - he's got less sense than a Brahmin at a crossroads.

topics.topic_text: I may be able to help you.
topics.response_text: Where I come from, we appreciate good intentions. I reckon you could help me figure out what's he doing in town.

topics.topic_text: I'll find out for you but not cheaply - 400 caps.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Cut that in half and we got a clean deal, kid.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll be back when I find out more about him.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! I appreciate it. I hope to see you soon.

topics.topic_text: The best don't come cheap, Walter. 400 caps' my fee.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, kid! I'm taking a liking to you. It's a deal.

topics.topic_text: Actually, let me consider it first.
topics.response_text: That's okay, kid. I understand - let me know if you change your mind, will you?

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll be back when I find out more about him.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! I appreciate it. I hope to see you soon.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll be back when I find out more about him.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! I appreciate it. I hope to see you soon.

topics.topic_text: How is Heck a threat to other ranchers in The Wasteland?
topics.response_text: We are honest folk out there, damn hard to make a living in the desert, kid. Heck's a different breed, goddamn thief he is.

topics.topic_text: I'll take care of them.
topics.response_text: Ethel's going to be madder than a wet hen but you reap what you sow, kid, and Heck's earned every ounce of misery he gets. So, we have a deal?

topics.topic_text: Heck's a powerful man - I'd need extra for his son's life, 500 caps.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You'll leave me drier than tumbleweed, kid, but I reckon anything I can do to get back at Heck is well worth the expense.

topics.topic_text: 500 and Ted's history.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Cut that in half and we got a clean deal, kid.

topics.topic_text: I'm not interested right now. Sorry, Walter.
topics.response_text: I won't hold it against you, kid. You got to do your clean thing, I respect that.

topics.topic_text: Tell me again about your home.
topics.response_text: Darn far it is, our ranch. Ethel would be happy to yap about that - I got more important things in mind, kid.

topics.topic_text: What's being a Bighorn rancher like?
topics.response_text: Bighorners' my trade since I was a youngin. I confess it's hard living these days, kid. The Wasteland ain't the same anymore.

topics.topic_text: It turns out that Ted Gunderson's disappeared. Heck's looking for him.
topics.response_text: I'll be damned! You mean the young Gunderson? That's a shave tail if I ever saw one - he's got less sense than a Brahmin at a crossroads.

topics.topic_text: Placeholder for good path in quest.
topics.response_text: Kid, look around you, there's poison and death everywhere, and people like Heck are responsible for the misery we suffer.

topics.topic_text: Ted's a goner.
topics.response_text: Good work. I'm sorry that stupid mail-order cowboy ended like that but his father's misery makes it well worthy.

topics.topic_text: You don't have to worry about Heck Gunderson, ever again.
topics.response_text: Hahaha! Yeeeehaw! Now, that's something I thought I'd never hear.

topics.topic_text: Consider it done.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! Be good.

topics.topic_text: Consider it done.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! Be good.

topics.topic_text: Consider it done.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! Be good.

topics.topic_text: Consider it done.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! Be good.

topics.topic_text: Consider it done.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! Be good.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk prices.
topics.response_text: I hear you. What's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: You might like to know that Heck's barely protected, right now.
topics.response_text: So, Ted's nowhere to be found and Heck's quite unprotected while looking for him, huh?

topics.topic_text: We said 1000 for Heck, right?
topics.response_text: That's what we said. So, do we have a deal?

topics.topic_text: Heck for 500, correct?
topics.response_text: That's what we said. So, do we have a deal?

topics.topic_text: Ted's worth 500 to you, then?
topics.response_text: That's what we said. So, do we have a deal?

topics.topic_text: So, 250 for Ted it is?
topics.response_text: That's what we said. So, do we have a deal?

topics.topic_text: The Gundersons are history.
topics.response_text: Both Gundersons, gone? I'll be damned, you are one of a kind!

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! Be good.

topics.topic_text: None but...huh, what right do you have?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Same, the right of might, kid. The Gundersons will pay for all their crimes and that's final.

topics.topic_text: You are just giving them the excuse they need.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hell, a good thrashing is what I want to give them but I see your point, kid. Things will never change without us good folks.

topics.topic_text: You should know that Heck's dead.
topics.response_text: Hahaha! Yeeeehaw! Now, that's something I thought I'd never hear.

topics.topic_text: Why was Heck such a threat to other ranchers?
topics.response_text: People like Heck are rotten, kid, plenty of them in the Wasteland. They'll shoot you, kidnap your family, or drive NCR troops through your lands.

topics.topic_text: I've dealt with the Gundersons.
topics.response_text: You have? What are you waiting for, kid? Spill the beans!

topics.topic_text: You don't have to worry about Heck, ever again.
topics.response_text: Hahaha! Yeeeehaw! Now, that's something I thought I'd never hear.

topics.topic_text: Ted's dead.
topics.response_text: Good work. I'm sorry that stupid mail-order cowboy ended like that but his father's misery makes it well worthy.

topics.topic_text: Heck and Ted are dead.
topics.response_text: Both Gundersons, gone? I'll be damned, you are one of a kind!

topics.topic_text: Two Gundersons, that's worth a 1000 caps at least.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You'll leave me drier than tumbleweed, kid, but I reckon anything I can do to get back at Heck is well worth the expense.

topics.topic_text: I don't charge for good deeds.
topics.response_text: You don't want anything in return? That's rare in these times, got to say.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: You don't want anything in return? That's rare in these times, got to say.

topics.topic_text: The big Gunderson's worth 750 caps, at least.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You'll leave me drier than tumbleweed, kid, but I reckon anything I can do to get back at Heck is well worth the expense.

topics.topic_text: The young Gunderson's worth 500 caps, at least.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You'll leave me drier than tumbleweed, kid, but I reckon anything I can do to get back at Heck is well worth the expense.

topics.topic_text: I don't charge for good deeds.
topics.response_text: You don't want anything in return? That's rare in these times, got to say.

topics.topic_text: Sounds good.
topics.response_text: I'm a man of my word. Here's your money. You've earned it.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: You don't want anything in return? That's rare in these times, got to say.

topics.topic_text: We said 400 for information about Heck, right?
topics.response_text: That's what we said. So, do we have a deal?

topics.topic_text: We do.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! I appreciate it. I hope to see you soon.

topics.topic_text: Okay, 200 for information about Heck, right?
topics.response_text: That's what we said. So, do we have a deal?

topics.topic_text: We do.
topics.response_text: All right, kid! I appreciate it. I hope to see you soon.

topics.topic_text: What are the most dangerous places in the Wasteland?
topics.response_text: {Hint of Irony}Hell, it's all dangerous. Know why? Because you can't trust anything that stands on two legs.

topics.topic_text: VMS25WalterPheebusTopicEthelDead
topics.response_text: Ethel, darling!{Pause, as anger boils inside - wife just got killed}I'll... I'll join you soon again! Someone's gonna pay first, though.
